sen.j: 醒井養鱒場（さめがいようそんじょう）は、滋賀県米原市にある、県立淡水魚養殖・研究施設。
sen.e: Somegai Trout Farm is a prefectural facility for freshwater fish cultivation and research, located in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.
Samegai Trout Farm is a prefectural facility for freshwater fish cultivation and research, located in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.
Samegai Trout Farm is a prefectural facility for freshwater fish cultivation and research, located in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: その規模は、東洋一を誇るといわれる。
sen.e: It is regarded the largest of its kind in the Orient.
It is regarded the largest of its kind in the Orient.
It is regarded the largest of its kind in the Orient.

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: Chronology
Chronology
Chronology

sen.j: 1878年（明治11年） 琵琶湖に棲むビワマスの養殖の目的で県営孵化場を設置する。
sen.e: 1878: Prefectural fish farm established for cultivation of Biwa trout in Lake Biwa.
1878: Prefectural fish incubation farm was established for cultivation of Biwa trout in Lake Biwa.
sen.cmt: wasを加えました。孵化が訳されていないので、incubationを加えました。
sen.e: 1878: Prefectural fish incubation farm was established for cultivation of Biwa trout in Lake Biwa.

sen.j: 1879年（明治12年） 現在地に移転する。
sen.e: 1879: The farm is relocated to its present location.
1879: The farm is relocated to its present location.
1879: The farm is relocated to its present location.

sen.j: 1885年（明治18年） 民間に払い下げる。
sen.e: 1885: Ownership of the farm transferred to the private sector.
1885: Ownership of the farm was transferred to the private sector.
1885: Ownership of the farm was transferred to the private sector.

sen.j: 1929年（昭和4年） 再び県営、滋賀県立水産試験場付属醒井養鱒場となる。
sen.e: 1929: The farm is again placed under prefectural administration and becomes Somegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.
1929: The farm was again placed under prefectural administration and became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.
1929: The farm was again placed under prefectural administration and became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.

sen.j: 1977年（昭和52年） 滋賀県醒井養鱒場となる。
sen.e: 1977: The farm becomes Somegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefecture.
1977: The farm became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefecture.
1977: The farm became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 1992年（平成4年） 採卵場を新築。
sen.e: 1992: Fish egg gathering facility is built.
1992: Fish egg gathering facility was newly built.
1992: Fish egg gathering facility was newly built.

sen.j: 水源地の集水槽内に自動除塵設備を整備。
sen.e: Automatic dust filtration facility is installed in the water collection tank at the water source.
Automatic dust filtration facility was installed in the water collection tank at the water source.
Automatic dust filtration facility was installed in the water collection tank at the water source.

sen.j: 1993年（平成5年）～1994年（平成6年） 養魚用水路に自動除塵設備を整備し、稚魚池、親魚飼育池および餌付池に自動給餌機を設置。
sen.e: 1993-1994: Automatic dust filtration facility is installed in the fish farming water conduit, and automatic feeding devices are installed in the juvenile fish pond, adult fish pond and feeding pond.

1993-1994: Automatic dust filtration facility was installed in the fish farming water conduit, and automatic feeding devices were installed in the juvenile fish pond, adult fish pond and feeding pond.

1993-1994: Automatic dust filtration facility was installed in the fish farming water conduit, and automatic feeding devices were installed in the juvenile fish pond, adult fish pond and feeding pond.

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年） 老朽化した飼育池を解体。
sen.e: 1997: Dilapidated farming ponds are removed.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: 1997: Dilapidated farming ponds were removed.
1997: Dilapidated farming ponds were removed.

sen.j: 排水処理施設、研修施設、渓流魚観察池および渓流釣り体験池等を新設。
sen.e: Wastewater treatment facility, training facility, freshwater fish observation pond, stream fishing experience pond, etc., are built.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Wastewater treatment facility, training facility, freshwater fish observation pond, stream fishing experience pond, etc., were built.
Wastewater treatment facility, training facility, freshwater fish observation pond, stream fishing experience pond, etc., were built.

sen.j: 2000年（平成12年） 滋賀県水産試験場醒井養鱒分場となる。
sen.e: 2000: The farm becomes Somegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.
2000: The farm became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.
2000: The farm became Samegai Trout farm under Shiga Prefectural Fisheries Experiment Station.

sen.j: 交通
sen.e: Transportation
Access
Access

sen.j: 米原インターチェンジから国道21号を伊吹町・関ヶ原町方面へ。
sen.e: From Maihara Interchange, get on National Route 21 bound for Ibuki-cho and Sekigahara-cho.
From Maibara Interchange, take the National Route 21 toward Ibuki-cho and Sekigahara-cho.
sen.cmt: Maihara → Maibaraget on → take theboud for → toward
sen.e: From Maibara Interchange, take the National Route 21 toward Ibuki-cho and Sekigahara-cho.

sen.j: 醒ヶ井駅前交差点を右折。
sen.e: Turn right at Samegai-ekimae intersection.
Turn right at Samegai-ekimae intersection.
Turn right at Samegai-ekimae intersection.

sen.j: 施設
sen.e: Facilities
Facilities
Facilities

sen.j: 醒井渓谷の豊かな水を利用し、ニジマスを主に、アマゴ・イワナなど清流のみでしか生息することができない数々の淡水魚が生育されており、総面積は約19 ヘクタールである。
sen.e: Using the abundant water of Somegai Valley, freshwater fish that are found only in clean streams, such as red-spotted masu trout and Japanese char, as well as rainbow trout, are farmed in total land area of roughly 19 hectares.

Using the abundant water of Samegai Valley, freshwater fish that are found only in clean streams, such as red-spotted masu trout and Japanese char, as well as rainbow trout, are farmed in total land area of roughly 19 hectares.

Using the abundant water of Samegai Valley, freshwater fish that are found only in clean streams, such as red-spotted masu trout and Japanese char, as well as rainbow trout, are farmed in total land area of roughly 19 hectares.

sen.j: 大小80あまりの池があり、ニジマスの数に関しては約160万尾といわれる。
sen.e: There are roughly 80 ponds of various sizes, where the number of rainbow trout is estimated at 1.6 million.
There are roughly 80 ponds of various sizes, where the number of rainbow trout is estimated at 1.6 million.
There are roughly 80 ponds of various sizes, where the number of rainbow trout is estimated at 1.6 million.

sen.j: 場内には釣り堀や料理店があり、釣り堀で釣った鱒を料理店に持ち込んで、調理してもらうことも可能。
sen.e: There are fishing pond and restaurant which offers visitors the service of cooking trout fished at the pond for eating in the premises.
There are fishing pond and restaurant which offers visitors the service of cooking trout fished at the pond for eating in the premises.
There are fishing pond and restaurant which offers visitors the service of cooking trout fished at the pond for eating in the premises.

sen.j: 場内には、清流飲用所もある。
sen.e: There is a stream water drinking facility in the premises.
There is a facility to serve drinkable stream water in the premises.
sen.cmt: drinking facilityでは意味が通らないと考えてリライトしました。
sen.e: There is a facility to serve drinkable stream water in the premises.

sen.j: なお、ここで養殖されたニジマスは、JR米原駅の駅弁である「元祖鱒寿し」の食材としても使用されている。
sen.e: Rainbow trout farmed here is used to prepare trout sushi lunch boxes sold at JR Maibara Station.
Rainbow trout farmed here is used to prepare 'Ganso Masu Sushi' (sushi with trout) lunch boxes sold at JR Maibara Station.
sen.cmt: 用語集に統一しました。
sen.e: Rainbow trout farmed here is used to prepare 'Ganso Masu Sushi' (sushi with trout) lunch boxes sold at JR Maibara Station.
